title: SigScale CGF: Records on the Bx interface for Account Balance Management Function (ABMF)

BalanceRecord.description: Account Balance Management Function (ABMF) charging data record (CDR).

appliedProduct.description: Identifies the (sub) product offering applied to.

voucherFaceValue.description: Indicates the face value of a voucher.

channelId.description: Unique identifier for the distribution channel.

accountType.description: Indicates the type of subscriber payment.

channelMethod.description: Indicates a method used for a transaction.

otherParty.description: Indicates a third party in a transaction.

cdrId.description: Unique identifier for a balance CDR.

timestamp.description: Indicates the time of the change.

resultCode.description: Indicates a specific reason for the result.

UsageVolumeBalanceEntry.description: Describes an applied balance change (e.g. voucher redemption).

name.description: Name of an applied balance change.

UnitValue.description: Specifies a floating-point value. The UnitValue is a significand with an exponent; i.e., UnitValue = valueDigits * 10^exponent. This representation avoids unwanted rounding off. For example, the value of 2.3 is represented as ValueDigits = 23 and Exponent = -1. The absence of the exponent part MUST be interpreted as an exponent equal to zero.

valueDigits.description: The significand of the floating point value.

exponent.description: The exponent of the floating point value.

CurrencyCode.description: A currency code that specifies in which currency the values of monetary units were given.  It is specified by using the values defined in the ISO [4217](https://www.iso.org/iso-4217-currency-codes.html) standard.

productId.description: Identifies a subscription to a product offering.
